synopsis.text: Todoroki Gen, a gifted yet mishap-prone rally driver, grabs the attention of a prominent car manufacturing company, earning himself a lucrative sponsorship deal. This deal propels him and his French navigator, Rov Row, into the prestigious Safari Rally Kenya championship as part of the Seiyo racing team. However, the journey to victory is fraught with formidable adversaries and challenging terrains. This exhilarating car racing anime is an adaptation of Kaoru Shintani's manga, which was serialized in Big Comic Superior from 1988 to 1990. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride filled with high-speed action and intense competition!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
